title: When in Doubt... Improvise

speakers.name: Matt "Kelly" Williams
speakers.bio: Matt Williams always wanted to be a Renaissance Person. Maybe one day he will be. In the meantime, he does photography, designs tabletop games, reads, cooks, weaves, hacks, and spends time with his wife and daughter in Columbus, OH.

excerpt: Join us for a fun filled deep dive into the world of improvisation. In this hands on deep dive you will learn and practice techniques and skills to create something out of nothing. These skills, in turn, can help any time you need to speak in public or work in groups. Come ready to be a little...
description: Join us for a fun filled deep dive into the world of improvisation. In this hands on deep dive you will learn and practice techniques and skills to create something out of nothing. These skills, in turn, can help any time you need to speak in public or work in groups. Come ready to be a little silly, learn a lot, and have fun. Be ready to discover who's line it really is (yours?) and the importance of saying "Yes".
